message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a starting price of $14,000. I believe it holds significant value and this reflects its worth in the current market.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $8,000. Would that work for you?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $8,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $12,500. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a valuable asset.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $12,500 is still a bit more than I had in mind.  Could we meet in the middle somewhere around $10,000?
